episodes.title: cult trauma abuse survivor and therapist  —  interviewing a former jehovah’s witness practitioner
episodes.description:
Lee Marsh on the multiple ‘judicial committee’ (internal church law rulings) meetings, and the superficiality and hypocrisy of dealing with fellow faith members and their elder leaders.
 □ /Fjbi8gp-ec4       uploaded 2015
Full 83 Minute (2000) programme ⤵️
youtube.com/watch?v=n6FGc-4KZpE

episodes.title: JW.org on BBC National Radio · Jehovah's Witness 'Shunning' doctrine discussed with Phone-in calls.
episodes.description:
JW.org Shunning item starts 45:00  · The Jehovah's Witnesses practice of Shunning discussed, cult members ordered & directed to shun their own family. Twenty minute segment at 45;00 w/ phone in.

Jeremy Vine program, Presented by Vanessa Feltz
